title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Visual and Academic Literacy for Higher Education Administrator Capability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can interpret complex academic concepts with over 80% accuracy using visual materials (infographics, diagrams).
Learners can design three or more types of educational materials applying academic literacy (text structuring, logical analysis) in language education settings.
Learners can provide feedback on peers’ visual and academic materials using a 4-level scale with competency-based assessment rubrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
